    "size": 14443,
    "content": "# Week-by-Week Action Plan
## Building VR Demo + Raising $500K Simultaneously

**Timeline:** 8 weeks to funding
**Strategy:** Build in public, pitch as you go
**Hours:** 40-60 hours/week (you said full-time attention)

---

## Week 1 (Feb 12-18): Foundation

### VR Development (20 hours)
**Monday:**
- [ ] Install Unity + packages (3 hours) - `UNITY-START-TODAY.md`
- [ ] Set up Quest 3, test connection (1 hour)
- [ ] Create first VR project (1 hour)

**Tuesday:**
- [ ] Build empty scene to Quest 3 (1 hour)
- [ ] Display first photo from API (3 hours)
- [ ] Fix bugs, iterate (2 hours)

**Wednesday-Thursday:**
- [ ] Display 10 photos in grid (3 hours)
- [ ] Add basic navigation (2 hours)
- [ ] Test with real photos (2 hours)
- [ ] Performance optimization (2 hours)

**Friday:**
- [ ] Record video of progress (1 hour)
- [ ] Document what you learned (1 hour)
- [ ] Plan Week 2 features (1 hour)

### Fundraising (15 hours)
**Monday:**
- [ ] Create investor tracking spreadsheet (1 hour)
- [ ] Research first 10 investors (VR focused) (2 hours)

**Tuesday:**
- [ ] Personalize and send 10 emails (2 hours)
- [ ] Research next 10 investors (1 hour)

**Wednesday:**
- [ ] Send 10 more emails (data/consumer investors) (2 hours)
- [ ] Research angels (1 hour)

**Thursday:**
- [ ] Send 10 emails to angels (2 hours)
- [ ] Respond to any replies (1 hour)

**Friday:**
- [ ] Send 10 emails (generalist seed) (2 hours)
- [ ] Schedule any meetings that came in (1 hour)

### Other (5 hours)
- [ ] Give beginner programmer Week 1 tasks (1 hour)
- [ ] Review her work daily (30 min/day)
- [ ] Run API, keep it working (ongoing)

**Week 1 Goal:** VR demo shows 10 photos + 50 investors contacted

---

## Week 2 (Feb 19-25): Iteration + Meetings

### VR Development (20 hours)
**Monday-Tuesday:**
- [ ] Improve photo layout (circular or timeline?) (4 hours)
- [ ] Add date labels (2 hours)
- [ ] Better materials/lighting (2 hours)

**Wednesday-Thursday:**
- [ ] Timeline view (photos chronologically) (4 hours)
- [ ] Navigation improvements (2 hours)
- [ ] Test user experience (2 hours)

**Friday:**
- [ ] Polish everything visible (2 hours)
- [ ] Record demo video v2 (1 hour)
- [ ] Bug fixes (1 hour)

### Fundraising (15 hours)
**Monday-Tuesday:**
- [ ] Follow up on Week 1 emails (no response) (3 hours)
- [ ] Do first investor demos (if any scheduled) (4 hours)

**Wednesday-Friday:**
- [ ] More investor demos (6 hours)
- [ ] Send thank you emails + follow-ups (1 hour)
- [ ] Research 20 more investors (1 hour)

### Other (5 hours)
- [ ] Review beginner programmer's Week 1 work (1 hour)
- [ ] Assign Week 2 tasks (30 min)
- [ ] Daily check-ins with her (30 min/day)

**Week 2 Goal:** Timeline working + 3-5 investor meetings done

---

## Week 3 (Feb 26 - Mar 3): AI Integration

### VR Development (25 hours)
**Monday-Tuesday:**
- [ ] Integrate OpenAI API (3 hours)
- [ ] Text-to-speech / voice input research (2 hours)
- [ ] Simple text search UI (3 hours)

**Wednesday-Thursday:**
- [ ] Voice command: "Show me photos from Christmas" (4 hours)
- [ ] Display AI responses in VR (3 hours)
- [ ] Test with multiple queries (2 hours)

**Friday:**
- [ ] Polish AI interaction (2 hours)
- [ ] Record demo video v3 (AI features) (2 hours)
- [ ] Performance check (2 hours)
- [ ] Bug bash (2 hours)

### Fundraising (10 hours)
**All week:**
- [ ] Investor demos (5-10 meetings scheduled) (8 hours)
- [ ] Follow-ups and thank yous (2 hours)

### Other (5 hours)
- [ ] Beginner programmer: Review her Figma mockups (1 hour)
- [ ] Give feedback, iterate (2 hours)
- [ ] Collect her 3D assets for use (1 hour)
- [ ] Weekly team check-in (1 hour)

**Week 3 Goal:** AI working in demo + 5-10 total meetings done

---

## Week 4 (Mar 4-10): Polish to Perfection

### VR Development (25 hours)
**Theme:** Make it beautiful and fast

**Monday:**
- [ ] Lighting pass (perfect the mood) (3 hours)
- [ ] Material improvements (textures, reflections) (2 hours)

**Tuesday:**
- [ ] UI polish (fonts, colors, layout) (3 hours)
- [ ] Loading screens / transitions (2 hours)

**Wednesday:**
- [ ] Performance: Hit 72+ FPS everywhere (4 hours)
- [ ] Reduce load time to < 5 seconds (2 hours)

**Thursday:**
- [ ] Add 3D assets from beginner programmer (2 hours)
- [ ] Sound effects / spatial audio (2 hours)

**Friday:**
- [ ] Final bug fixes (2 hours)
- [ ] Record final demo video (beautiful) (2 hours)
- [ ] Test with fresh users (family/friends) (1 hour)

### Fundraising (10 hours)
**All week:**
- [ ] More investor demos (6 hours)
- [ ] Collect feedback, iterate pitch (2 hours)
- [ ] Identify most interested investors (1 hour)
- [ ] Ask for term sheets from interested (1 hour)

### Other (5 hours)
- [ ] Hire designer on Fiverr for pitch deck ($500-1000) (2 hours to brief)
- [ ] Give designer all materials (1 hour)
- [ ] Review beginner programmer's work (1 hour)
- [ ] Team celebration (demo is done!) (1 hour)

**Week 4 Goal:** Demo is BEAUTIFUL + Several investors very interested

---

## Week 5 (Mar 11-17): Pitch Materials + More Meetings

### VR Development (10 hours)
**Monday-Wednesday:**
- [ ] Only critical bug fixes (no new features!) (3 hours)
- [ ] Practice demos (rehearse 10+ times) (3 hours)
- [ ] Backup plan if tech fails (have video ready) (1 hour)

**Thursday-Friday:**
- [ ] Test demo one final time (1 hour)
- [ ] Ensure Quest 3 is perfect condition (1 hour)
- [ ] Pack demo kit (Quest, cables, backup battery, laptop) (1 hour)

### Fundraising (25 hours)
**Monday-Tuesday:**
- [ ] Work with designer on pitch deck (4 hours)
- [ ] Review drafts, iterate (2 hours)

**Wednesday:**
- [ ] Finalize pitch deck (2 hours)
- [ ] Print leave-behind decks (1 hour)
- [ ] Practice full pitch 20 times (4 hours)

**Thursday-Friday:**
- [ ] Investor meetings (5-10 more) (10 hours)
- [ ] Ask most interested for term sheets (2 hours)

### Other (5 hours)
- [ ] Beginner programmer: Have her create demo materials folder (1 hour)
- [ ] She edits demo video with music/graphics (3 hours)
- [ ] Review her final work, give feedback (1 hour)

**Week 5 Goal:** Professional pitch deck + 1-2 term sheets in hand

---

## Week 6 (Mar 18-24): Final Push

### VR Development (5 hours)
- [ ] Only critical fixes (ongoing)
- [ ] Keep demo working perfectly (ongoing)
- [ ] No new development (focus on fundraising)

### Fundraising (30 hours)
**Monday-Wednesday:**
- [ ] Send 25 more emails (research + personalize) (6 hours)
- [ ] More investor meetings (10 hours)
- [ ] Follow up with very interested investors (3 hours)

**Thursday-Friday:**
- [ ] Chase term sheets (2 hours)
- [ ] Negotiate terms with 2-3 investors (4 hours)
- [ ] Lawyer review (if needed) (2 hours)
- [ ] Get first commitments ($100K-200K) (3 hours)

### Other (5 hours)
- [ ] Update team on progress (1 hour)
- [ ] Thank everyone who helped (1 hour)
- [ ] Prepare for momentum close (3 hours)

**Week 6 Goal:** First $100K-200K committed

---

## Week 7 (Mar 25-31): Momentum Close

### Fundraising (35 hours)
**All week:** Closing mode

**Monday:**
- [ ] Share good news with other interested investors (2 hours)
- [ ] "First $150K is committed, closing $350K more" (creates urgency)

**Tuesday-Wednesday:**
- [ ] More meetings with fence-sitters (6 hours)
- [ ] Use momentum to convert maybes to yeses (4 hours)

**Thursday-Friday:**
- [ ] Close remaining $300K-350K (8 hours)
- [ ] Get final commitments in writing (2 hours)
- [ ] Terms negotiation if needed (4 hours)

**Weekend:**
- [ ] Lawyer: Draft/review documents (4 hours)
- [ ] Start wiring instructions (2 hours)
- [ ] Celebrate (3 hours) 🎉

### VR Development (5 hours)
- [ ] Keep demo pristine (ongoing)
- [ ] Only critical fixes (if needed)

**Week 7 Goal:** $400K+ committed, closing final $100K

---

## Week 8 (Apr 1-7): Close & Hire

### Fundraising (20 hours)
**Monday-Wednesday:**
- [ ] Final commitments received (4 hours)
- [ ] Sign all documents (2 hours)
- [ ] Confirm wires (2 hours)

**Thursday:**
- [ ] Money hits bank account 🎉
- [ ] Send thank you notes to all investors (2 hours)

**Friday:**
- [ ] Update everyone who helped (1 hour)
- [ ] Post on LinkedIn/Twitter (30 min)
- [ ] Celebration dinner! (2 hours)

### Team Building (15 hours)
**Monday-Friday:**
- [ ] Post job listings (senior engineers) (2 hours)
- [ ] Review resumes (4 hours)
- [ ] Screen calls (4 hours)
- [ ] Schedule interviews for Week 9 (1 hour)
- [ ] Plan onboarding (2 hours)
- [ ] Promote beginner programmer officially (1 hour)
- [ ] Give her raise (she earned it!)

### Planning (5 hours)
- [ ] Plan next 12 months (1 hour)
- [ ] Set up proper accounting (1 hour)
- [ ] Legal stuff (incorporation if needed) (2 hours)
- [ ] Open company bank account (1 hour)

**Week 8 Goal:** $500K in bank + Hiring started

---

## Daily Schedule Template

### Morning (9am-12pm) - BUILD
- 9:00-10:30: VR development (deep work)
- 10:30-10:45: Break
- 10:45-12:00: VR development (continued)

### Afternoon (1pm-5pm) - FUNDRAISE
- 1:00-2:00: Investor research + email drafting
- 2:00-3:00: Send emails / respond to replies
- 3:00-5:00: Investor meetings (if scheduled)

### Evening (6pm-8pm) - REVIEW
- 6:00-7:00: Review beginner programmer's work
- 7:00-8:00: Plan tomorrow, update tracking

**Flexibility:** Swap morning/afternoon if investor meetings are mornings

---

... [truncated]
